TopicTitle: alignment of jool eclipsing the sun, minmus, moho, laythe and the mun.

Articles.Content:
Using alternis kerbol and distant object enhancement i was able to see all of the listed planets aligned. minmus and moho could only be seen with distant object enhancement but the rest were fine
